Html:
Can someone please advise me on how to get this into my 2013 deployment? I tired to import these as solutions however CRM is not allowing stating these are not solution files. I was going to submit new web resources for the .js and xmls files but then that appends them with the __org _ prefix to the names. I am new to this side of CRM so please pardon my ignorance on this.

Thank You

Hi There.

A starting point about CRM is to learn from the SDK. You will find information about web resource and how to manage JS library in CRM 2011 and CRM 2013.

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg309473.aspx

Hope this helps.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
